title: Luminary Member Hours: The Obama Portraits
hero_caption: (L) Kehinde Wiley. Barack Obama, 2018. Oil on canvas. © 2018 Kehinde Wiley. (R) Amy Sherald. Michelle LaVaughn Robinson Obama (detail), 2018. Oil on linen. National Portrait Gallery, Smithsonian Institution. The National Portrait Gallery is grateful to the generous donors who made these commissions possible and proudly recognizes them at npg.si.edu/obamaportraitstour.
short_description: These limited-capacity Luminary hours allow members to experience firsthand the power of Kehinde Wiley’s painting of President Barack Obama and Amy Sherald’s portrait of former First Lady Michelle Obama. On loan from the Smithsonian’s National Portrait Gallery, the Obama portraits come to Chicago for the first stop of a five-city tour.
list_description: Bringing the Luminary community together, these limited-capacity hours allow Luminary members to experience firsthand the power of Kehinde Wiley’s painting of President Barack Obama and Amy Sherald’s portrait of former First Lady Michelle Obama.
description:
These limited-capacity Luminary Hours allow members to experience firsthand the power of Kehinde Wiley’s painting of President Barack Obama and Amy Sherald’s portrait of former First Lady Michelle Obama. On loan from the Smithsonian’s National Portrait Gallery, these stunning portrayals are on view this summer at the Art Institute of Chicago for the first stop of The Obama Portraits tour.

All Luminary members must book timed tickets in advance. Four complimentary reservations per member household

Each reservation allows for a 15-minute viewing of The Obama Portraits and the opportunity to visit the Modern Wing while the museum is closed to the public. Space is limited to allow for the best experience possible. 

Upcoming Luminary Hours for The Obama Portraits﻿

Wednesday, July 7

Reservations available between 6:00 and 8:30

Tuesday, July 13

Reservations available between 6:00 and 8:30

Wednesday, July 14

Reservations available between 10:00 and 1:00

Due to capacity restrictions, entry is permitted only at the time of your reservation. Coat and bag check, dining, and valet services are currently unavailable. Learn more about what to expect.

Contact Us

If you have questions or are interested in learning more about Luminary membership, we’d be delighted to hear from you. Please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu. For information about accessibility accommodations, please email access@artic.edu.

The Obama Portraits Tour is organized by the Smithsonian’s National Portrait Gallery, Washington, DC. 

National Sponsor
buy_button_caption: Free, four complimentary reservations per member household
